preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from ALERT.DEFINED_FIELDS where SOURCE_KEY = 'provider.common.config.id'
select count(*) from ALERT.FIELD_CONTEXTS where FIELD_ID = GET_FIELD_ID('provider.common.config.id')

changeSet.author: gavink
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO alert.field_values (config_id, field_id, field_value) ( SELECT fv.config_id, GET_FIELD_ID('provider.common.config.id') AS field_id, ( SELECT dc1.id FROM alert.descriptor_configs dc1 WHERE ( dc1.context_id = GET_CONTEXT_ID('GLOBAL') AND dc1.descriptor_id = GET_DESCRIPTOR_ID('provider_blackduck') ) ) AS field_value FROM alert.field_values fv WHERE ( fv.field_id = GET_FIELD_ID('provider.common.config.name') AND fv.config_id IN ( SELECT dc2.id FROM alert.descriptor_configs dc2 WHERE dc2.context_id = GET_CONTEXT_ID('DISTRIBUTION') ) ) )
